title: File Management
description: The File Management feature provides a set of functionalities for interacting with project files and directories, enabling users to explore, manage, and access their codebase efficiently.
acceptance_criteria: The backend application provides APIs to retrieve the directory structure of a project, allowing the frontend to build a file tree representation.
The backend application exposes APIs to fetch the content of a specific file, enabling the frontend to display file content in a code editor.
The backend application allows users to select and deselect multiple files and directories, providing information about the selected files to the AI assistant.
